## ServerError class

Extends CustomError to represent a 500 Internal Server Error. Sets statusCode to 500 and status to 'error'.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class ServerError extends CustomError 
```
**Extends:** [CustomError](./jobber-shared.customerror.md)
